scopes.user: Grants read/write access to profile info only.
scopes.user:email: Grants read access to a user’s email addresses.
scopes.user:follow: Grants access to follow or unfollow other users.
scopes.public_repo: Grants read/write access to code, commit statuses, collaborators, and deployment statuses for public repositories and organizations.
scopes.repo: Grants read/write access to code, commit statuses, collaborators, and deployment statuses for public and private repositories and organizations.
scopes.repo_deployment: Grants access to deployment statuses for public and private repositories.
scopes.repo:status: Grants read/write access to public and private repository commit statuses.
scopes.delete_repo: Grants access to delete adminable repositories.
scopes.notifications: Grants read access to a user’s notifications.
scopes.read:repo_hook: Grants read and ping access to hooks in public or private repositories.
scopes.write:repo_hook: Grants read, write, and ping access to hooks in public or private repositories.
scopes.admin:repo_hook: Grants read, write, ping, and delete access to hooks in public or private repositories.
scopes.admin:org_hook: Grants read, write, ping, and delete access to organization hooks.
scopes.read:org: Read-only access to organization, teams, and membership.
scopes.admin:org: Fully manage organization, teams, and memberships.
scopes.read:public_key: List and view details for public keys.
scopes.write:public_key: Create, list, and view details for public keys.

get.summary: List repositories that are accessible to the authenticated user.
List organizations for the authenticated user
List repositories for the specified org
